Unfortunately, it was too late. A few seconds later, Goten shrunk to the size of a bug, but he didn't realize it yet. In fact, while he kept running, he only saw the walls becoming bigger and bigger, not wondering why since he was too scared to be caught by Bulma. Suddenly, a huge boot landed in front of him blocking his path. That's when he looked above to see the giant face of a mad Bulma.

" I TOLD YOU, SILLY BOY ! " She said.

" Bu..Bulma, why are you so biiiig ?! " Goten asked in shock.

" It's a shrinking candy ! And too bad for you, i couldn't creat any reverse effect yet !! What am i going to do with you now ? ".
15121.title: 7 yr Goten

155232.content: You awaken in a groggy daze, your eyes adjusting to the light as you come to. The last thing you remember is watching your favorite anime, Dragonball Z, when a bright light suddenly enveloped your TV and you passed out. That was all you remembered as you shook your head and noticed your surroundings. They look oddly familiar to you until you take a look out of one of the windows to see that you were floating in a spacecraft in the dark void of space. "I though this place was familiar, this looks just like Frieza's ship! How the hell did I-" You were cut off from your train of thought as you were suddenly surrounded by Frieza's men and they point blasters at you. So as not to cause an uproar you surrender holding your arms up and they soon cuff you and take you further into the bowels of the ship. Soon you are face to face with the tyrant himself, Frieza, who was in his final form. "Who is this pitiful creature you bring before me"? Frieza asks in a cold tone. "A stowaway sir" replies one of the men. "A stowaway? Hm....." He looks you up and down, raising a curious brow at your unusual garb and mannerisms. You likewise look the tyrant in the eyes and feel a small chill creep up your spine. "Leave us" He says to his soldiers. "I will deal with this one myself". You gulp nervously as the troops leave Frieza's throne room. "Now tell me how it is you managed to sneak aboard my ship?...." You stammer slightly but then explain how you simply woke up here with no recollection as to how. "Interesting" he replies as his tail slowly swayed back and forth. "And do you know who I am"? He asks in a coy tone. "O-of course"! You reply and go along with it so as not to upset him. "You are the mighty Lord Frieza, the most powerful being in the universe"! You bow in order to add to his delight. "Despite the circumstances it is an honor to even be in your presence". He grins at your comment. "I see my illustrious reputation precedes me. And from your words it sounds as though your loyalties do indeed lie with me". He says standing over you with his arms folded. "I am most certainly loyal to you mighty one"! you reply in earnest to keep in his good graces. He smirks at your comment. "Then, by all means, prove it...."
155232.title: Frieza!

1552321.content: "H-How"? You ask the might overlord. *He grins mischievously at your question, and raises his right foot, his three toes wiggling in the air. "Kiss my feet" He commands you. You stare at the sole of his powerful foot and watch as the three toes wiggle in anticipation, and you couldn't help but blush slightly seeing this, as you had a foot fetish yourself. Without wasting much time you comply. "As you wish Lord Frieza". You then lean in, your face mere inches from his foot and pucker your lips, planting a deep kiss on the sole of his foot. Frieza smiles at your compliance "Good boy, you may be of use to me yet" He then walks over and sits in his large throne and calls you over. You proceed to follow him to his throne. "On your hands and knees...." He states. You nod and get on your hands and knees as he commanded. Then, with a grin he holds up both of his large powerful feet in front of your face. "Now worship my feet, like a good slave". 'S-slave'? you think to yourself, 'suppose it's better than being dead'. "As you command Lord Frieza" you reply and proceed to keep kissing the surprisingly soft soles of his alien feet. "Good, but don't forget my toes" he says as he presses his toes against your lips. You nod and deeply kiss each of his toes, letting out a small blush. "My my, what a cheeky boy. Don't think I haven't noticed" he says using one of his feet to rub and prod at the crotch of your pants, feeling your hardened member. "You're enjoying being at my feet aren't you slave"? He asks in a condescending tone, a smile on his face with a hand under his chin. You blush even more in reply, letting out a tiny squeak like moan as his foot presses against your member. "Y-yes Lord Frieza" You admit to him. He chuckles in response as he continues to lightly rub against your pants. "Fear not little slave, for who could possibly blame you? I AM the most revered and powerful being in the universe. It's only natural to be overwhelmed with your dsires when presented with such an opportunity as this" He goes on with a small grin. "Who knows, if you do a good enough job..." He takes his feet and rubs them against your cheeks. "I might even indulge you, so get to it slave". Your eyes widen at his potential proposition and nod vigorously. "At once Master Frieza"! You then proceed to continue passionately kissing every inch of his luscious feet, the bulge in your pants growing evermore. "Hm....'Master Frieza'?....I like it, henceforth that shall be what you call me, understood"? You nod "Yes Master Frieza" He chuckles at your response and continues to enjoy the treatment.
1552321.title: "Worship my feet"
